message.name: ERR_RV_RECORD_CANCELLED
message.locale: This quick link has been canceled and cannot be modified.
This quick link has been cancelled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_QUICKLINK_FV_PAGE_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Curam page name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_QUICKLINK_RV_NAME_EXISTS_ALREADY
message.locale: The name given to the quick link must only exist once as a quick link.

message.name: ERR_QUICKLINK_RV_PAGE_NAME_EXISTS_ALREADY
message.locale: The Curam page name must only exist once as a quick link.

message.name: INF_QUICKLINK_APPLICATION_LINKS_EXCEED_MAX
message.locale: It is recommended for usability purposes that the number of quick links should not exceed "%1n".
